Subject: Ryan on DL Date: Thu, 15 Apr 1993 20:57:59 GMT Lines: 18
Heard minutes ago on KOA radio, Denver.
Nolan Ryan to have arthroscopic on a knee, and to miss 2 - 5 weeks.
Rockies (Nied) lead Mets (Gooden) 4 - 0 in 7th. All runs in first inning.
